title: Add Viper Elite to gaming mice catalog

requirements.summary: Add Viper Elite gaming mouse product to the mice array in products.ts with complete specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Viper Elite appears in the gaming mice product grid on the homepage
Product card displays with consistent styling matching other mice products
Product includes specifications array with relevant gaming mouse specs

file_operations.description: Add new Viper Elite gaming mouse object to the mice array following the existing Product interface structure. Include name, description, price, and specifications array with gaming-relevant specs (DPI, sensor type, weight, polling rate, etc.) that match the pattern and detail level of existing mice products like Viper V3 Pro and Basilisk V3 Pro. Ensure price is consistent with the premium gaming mice pricing tier ($149-199 range). Use green neon accent color consistent with mice category requirements.
